tool_description: Constructs detailed MODS (Metadata Object Description Schema) records with hierarchical descriptive elements for complex digital objects.

title_info.description: Primary title information for the resource

name_entries.description: Personal or corporate names associated with the resource

type_of_resource.description: Resource type: text, cartographic, notated_music, sound_recording, moving_image, still_image, software_multimedia, mixed_material

genre.description: Genre or form of the material

abstract.description: Summary or abstract of the content

table_of_contents.description: Table of contents or structured description

error_messages: Invalid resource type: Use text, cartographic, notated_music, sound_recording, moving_image, still_image, software_multimedia, or mixed_material
Empty title: title_info is required and cannot be empty
Invalid name format: Names should follow standard cataloging conventions
Missing required elements: MODS records must include title_info and type_of_resource
Invalid classification format: Classification should follow standard numbering systems
usage: Provide title_info and type_of_resource as minimum requirements. Add descriptive elements like name_entries, genre, origin_info, and subject_terms for comprehensive description. Include access_condition and related_items for complete resource relationships.

mods_xml.description: Complete MODS record in XML format

record_identifier.description: Unique identifier for the MODS record
